Everything you need, nothing you don't

Microlytics gives you the essential analytics you need without the complexity, tracking, or privacy concerns of traditional tools.

Privacy-First by Design

We don't track users across sites. 100% GDPR-compliant. No cookies, no fingerprinting, no personal data collection.

Instant Insights

Real-time dashboards with zero-lag pageviews. See what's happening on your site right now, not hours later.

Developer Friendly

One-line install snippet. Works with any stack — React, Vue, WordPress, static sites. Simple REST API included.

Get started in 3 simple steps

No complex setup, no configuration files, no headaches. Just add one line of code and you're done.

1

Add your site and get a unique script

Sign up and create a new site in seconds. We'll generate a unique tracking script just for you.

2

Paste it before your </head> tag

Copy the one-line script and add it to your website. Works with any platform or framework.

3

Watch real-time metrics roll in

That's it! Your dashboard will start showing visitor data immediately. No configuration needed.

index.html
<head>
<script async defer src=“https://microlytics.app/m.js”
data-site=“YOUR_SITE_ID”></script>
</head>
